Under the heavy foliage, Katya watches the scene. She definitely sees 
that Hydras is the main attacker. Wolfenstein is a threat too.

Katya: What is the range of your weapons, Blackfang?

Blackfang: My shotgun can fire up to mid-range, and my pulse laser 
only to short range.

Katya thinks a moment.

Katya: Okay. I will make a hit-and-run while you remain covered and 
try to take that wolfboy out. After that, go back in the trees.

Blackfang nods. She starts running, still far from the Predacons and 
opens fire with her heavy large and medium lasers. She aims mainly 
Hydras. Blackfang starts pumping four energy shots at Wolfenstein.
He then fall back in the trees.

Katya: Star Colonel, the kills are yours. Skill, Ragnar!

Ragnar: Skill, Katya! Kup, Aerotaur, Windlord, Empath, concentrate 
your fire on my targets, the main Pred force. Forget about honor, take 
all the targets you want.

He locks his missiles on Wolfenstein and lets them loose on him along 
with a large laser, while he shoots the other large laser at Hydras as 
well as a supersonic gauss slug.

Ragnar: Maximals, today, we rid this planet of the scum that stains 
it!

> "I'd say we have to distract those goons before they knock the 
> shields out."  Wheeljack indicates Hydras's group.  "The defense 
grid

> there."  He points out Devilcat and Gatara, blazing away with 
> repeated bursts from their weapons of choice.
>
